name: Paid Jewels
flavor_text: Jewels purchased with money. Can be used for Paid Jewel Summons, replacing Free Jewels, etc.

name: Jewels
flavor_text: Jewels that can be used at the Shop and for Summons.

name: Aurum
flavor_text: Currency that can be used at the Forge and in the Shop.

name: Guild Points
flavor_text: Obtained by contributing to the Guild. Can be exchanged for items.
